title: Adobe Color
description: Tool for creating color palettes based on various combinations like complementary, analogous, and monochromatic.

title: Coolors
description: Color palette generator that lets you explore harmonious combinations and view palettes created by other users.

title: Color Hunt
description: Collection of free, high-quality color palettes curated by the community.

title: Material Palette
description: Color palette generator inspired by Google's Material Design guidelines.

title: Color Supply
description: Color palette generator offering harmonious combinations and letting you explore palettes created by other users.

title: ColorSpace
description: Color palette generator offering harmonious combinations and letting you explore palettes created by other users.

title: ColorZilla
description: Browser extension that lets you pick the color code from any element on a webpage.

title: Color Picker by Hex
description: Tool for selecting colors and getting their hexadecimal and RGB codes.

title: Tintmint
description: Color palette generator with a simple and visual interface for exploring color combinations for design.

title: UI Colors
description: Color palette generator for UI designers with a simple interface to create and copy color combinations.

title: Palette Maker
description: App for creating color palettes from images with customization options.

title: Color Beta
description: Online tool for exploring color combinations with options to create custom palettes.

title: Happy Hues
description: Color palette generator with harmonious combinations and usage examples to help with web design.

title: Colormind
description: AI-powered color palette generator that creates palettes based on images or predefined colors.

title: uigradients
description: Collection of gradients inspired by colors used by Snapchat.

title: Eva Design Colors
description: Color palette generator with a wide variety of harmonious combinations for web design.

title: CopyPalette
description: Color palette generator that allows easy copying and pasting of color combinations.

title: Flat UI Colors
description: Collection of flat colors for creating modern and minimalist palettes.
